Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37501 affecting package hdf5 for versions less than 1.12.1-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-37501 affecting package hdf5 for versions less than 1.12.1-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package hdf5 is earlier than 1.12.1-13, affected by CVE-2021-37501
